WorkItem.Description: So for some reason Rawr now says the two best tanking sigils, Sigil of Insolence and Sigil of Deflection, are worth negative points.

Comments.Message:
I'll look into it.  I have Sigil of insolence on my Tank so not sure why it would be negative.  Please post your character XML so if I can't repro on my own toon, that I can use yours.

Thank you.

I've found it as well that the sigils are messed. Parsing upgrades Rawr DK recons that Sigil of Deflection are worth more than 3 milion points for upgrade while I have at present Sigil of Insolence equiped. I though only recently started using Rawr as I PUG raid and only recently got a trophey and I'm not sure what to spend it on, thus my available gear is rather the gear I though needed to select to be used for potential upgrade list.

Ok... The problem is with the Blood rotation.  and more specifically any custom rotation that ends up with a RP deficit.  RS goes negative, and so anything with RS trigger goes negative as well.  The default Blood rotation is running a 10 pt RS deficit and when it balances the numbers go all wonky. 

I'll see if I can patch this without having to do the whole rotation re-write that I have scheduled.
